answers.answer: You could try a homeopathic remedy called Thuja which has good success in treating this problem.

You would need to get checked out what is causing your double urine flow.This could be to do with a urinary infection, uncontrolled diabetes or a prostate problem.Make an appointment to see your doctor and take a urine sample with you.A doctor can prescribe medication to reduce the urine flow if he felt you needed this.  My husband stopped taking it because it gave him side effects.

question: Treatment for male double urine flow?
title: unusual  urine flow
